availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Organized at Ottawa, LaSalle County, Illinois. Mustered into service on December 3, 1862. Mustered out of service on July 18, 1865. Commander(s): Captain Edward C. Henshaw.

ab.bibl:
Frederick H. Dyer, A Compendium of the War of the Rebellion (De Moines, Iowa: The Dyer Publishing Company, 1908), 1045.
Official Army Register of the Volunteer Force of the United States Army for the years 1862, '63, '64, '65, Part VI: Indiana-Illinois, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1865), 220
